{"id":"JT-47149","entityId":"25-1983309","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47149"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add an ability to edit attachment in the comments on new FSI"},{"name":"description","value":"
Currently, there is no option to edit the image in the comment section.



Plese note that after I clicked "add comment" this "edit" button appeared.
\n"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525955711942"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526324524071"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim {"id":"JT-47151","entityId":"25-1983333","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47151"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't properly add an image to a comment via keyboard (Cmd/Ctrl+V)"},{"name":"description","value":"
1. Edit comment
2. Want to insert (cmd+c) an image in the comment text.
3. The image is uploading, it's said "uploaded" but it doesn't appear in the text.
4. Refresh the page, the image is attached but not in the text as it was supposed to.

!image.png!
\n"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525957039671"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526324500021"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Natasha.Katson"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Natasha Katson"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-866","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"weird_edit_issue.gif","id":"74-522978","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/weird_edit_issue.gif?file=74-522978&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}]
